comment._content: When I was a  kid   we  called  these   erections  "STOOKS",   and  setting  them  up  "STOOKING".

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Pic taken in 1907, at 'Woodlands', in the Gilmore Valley, near Tumut, in southern NSW. See my comments at www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/4903861352/
